headline.main: Pro-Nazi Critics Also Fight Vichy Council -- Weygand Bids Troops Ignore de Gaulle -- End of Impasse Is Expected Soon

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, Feb. 1 -- Reports from Paris today announced the formation of another militant body rivaling the one just created by Marshal Henri Philippe Petain, which would have the effect of pitting Paris against the provinces.
abstract: Vichy hears rept of Natl Popular Assembly formation, Paris, to rival body created by Petain; Berlin outlines Paris group program; Paris-Berlin pressure on Vichy increased; Petain reptd calm; Vichy speculates on Hitler's demand for Laval return; Paris reaction to Petain's Natl Council; Berne gets repts of Paris press campaign for Laval return

keywords.value: OCCUPATION AND REHABILITATION OF CONQUERED AREAS
